thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Last Head of Bear Stearns Taking on Wall Street Goliaths at Guggenheim

author: Justin Baer
title: Last Head of Bear Stearns Taking on Wall Street Goliaths at Guggenheim
text:
A decade after the financial crisis, the U.S. economy is cruising again and the stock market keeps climbing. But for many of the men and women at the center of the extraordinary events that nearly led to the collapse of the U.S. banking system, those frantic days changed their lives permanently.
Some made a name for themselves, steering their companies through chaos, bringing back a fortune by betting on the housing market’s collapse, or as part of the government’s effort to prop up the system. Others have retreated from...
